name: Andrew
heading: Hello my name is
intro: ðŸš€ Web developer on a mission to turn code into captivating user experiences. Seeking the perfect playground as a Junior Front-end enthusiast. Let's build the web together!.
about1: After more than a decade as a successful chef I sought a fresh challenge that would leverage my culinary expertise while allowing me to create collaborate and continuously learn.
para2: I took an interest in coding and enrolled in Le Wagon's Full stack Development Bootcamp working with Ruby we learnt the key concepts and practices of Object-oriented programming databases with SQL and Front-end with JavaScript HTML and CSS.
para3: Building on those skills we moved on to the Rails framework and in teams of three we designed built and deployed two functioning Web applications. Since Graduating I have been working mainly with React and TypeScript to build projects. Utilizing testing to make my code more robust and reading up on good web design principles.
